extendedInfo.description: Final Theory Test Singapore is an application that offers 100 final theory test questions. There are four different categories which covers different aspect of the actual test. There is a timed quiz for user to attempt. The timed quiz allows the user to take the test under actual test conditions i.e 50 questions to be completed under 50 minutes. Users are advised to attempt the timed quiz after completing the different categories of questions.Questions that are attempted before are shown in green or red boxes. The green boxes indicate that the questions are answered correctly. While the red boxes indicate that the question was answered wrongly the previous time. This allows the user to work on questions that they are weaker at.
